title: OXO Silicone Coasters
description: Contain drips and protect furniture with OXO Good Grips Coasters. The Coasters are reversible and both sides are concave to contain liquid. A grooved pattern holds liquid to prevent leaking, and the grooves promote air flow so the Coasters won't stick to glassware. These sturdy silicone Coasters are safe for all types of furniture surfaces. Available in packs of eight.

asset.title: OXO Silicone Coasters
asset.description:
http://www.oxo.com/p-903-silicone-coasters-8-pack.aspx

Contain drips and protect furniture with OXO Good Grips Coasters. The Coasters are reversible and both sides are concave to contain liquid. A grooved pattern holds liquid to prevent leaking, and the grooves promote air flow so the Coasters won't stick to glassware. These sturdy silicone Coasters are safe for all types of furniture surfaces. Available in packs of eight.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: At OXO, when we created our line of coasters, we set out to solve the big common pet peeve, coasters that stick to the bottom of the glass. The OXO coasters have a groove pattern that promotes airflow so the coasters won't stick to glassware.The holes also hold liquid to prevent leaking, contain drips, and protect furniture. The coasters are reversible and both sides are concave to contain liquid. These sturdy silicone coasters are safe fro all types of furniture surfaces. Here's a good tip, these coasters are whether proof, making them great additons to decks, porches, boats, and sun rooms.
